marklogic.body: The State of Florida must arrest Al Sharpton immediately, and a judge needs to issue a gag order on him barring him from discussing the case. Then Jesse Jackson, NBPP members, and anyone issuing illegal threats or Bounties. If this situation is allowed to play out according to mob rules, Florida will be Burning by summer. It's time for all levels of government to apply the Rule of Law in this case. So far, the mob is in control. If Florida Law Enforcement fails to apply the law now, the situation will soon be beyond their ability to do so without major injury and property damage. The media... well, don't get me started. F.N. idiots have no clue.
